course.title: Internship in Computing
course.catalogDescription: This course provides an opportunity for students to integrate theory with practice and develop skills immediately applicable in current positions available in their field. Students work full-time or part-time for a company in a position related to their major. Anticipated learning objectives are established in a contract agreed to by the student, the company supervisor, and the departmental faculty sponsor. This course may be repeated for credit, but at most 3 hours may count towards the total number of hours required for the major.

prerequisiteDisjunction.prerequisiteGeneral: Declared Computer Science or Cybersecurity Major
